-KISARAGI- has a function that allows ho: -KISARAGI- has a function that allows holders to exchange their own NFTs for new illustrations. As can be seen from the history of Japanese animation, the illustrations accepted by the masses change with the times.
In order to have long-term holders keep: In order to have long-term holders keep their NFTs, it will be possible to update the illustrations as the times change. This is a great feature that has never been seen before and prevents the problem of NFT illustrations becoming outdated.
Feature 2: Illustrations change with the: Feature 2: Illustrations change with the light of the moon
-KISARAGI- is a moon-themed NFT. By maki: -KISARAGI- is a moon-themed NFT. By making it a digital art synchronised with the phase of the moon, it becomes an ever-changing presence in our daily lives. The brightness of the NFT changes according to the brightness of the moon.
-KISARAGI- the genesis NFT launched by G: -KISARAGI- the genesis NFT launched by GuildQB, functions as a community pass.
Some NFT projects set up their communiti: Some NFT projects set up their communities and grant them utilities only to sell their NFTs. GuildQB, on the other hand, already has an existing community and the pass is issued while the community is growing.
